body:
There is no reason I can see to inspect or alter any ACLs.

However the readonly flag broke the build at 64078bf3cfce289ce069fc203464ef83a05e2bd3. It also caused an issue with removing git files on the builder and filled up my disk. Even as a long time windows developer I wasn't aware that this would be an issue because so many C# and Native Windows allows you to remove readonly files.

I +1 for Remove and RemoveAll be modified to remove readonly files.
